skills.desc:
Attacks 1 enemy. 

Damage increases by 50% if the target is under a [HP Burn] debuff.
skills.name: Roast
skills.books:
Lvl. 2 Damage +5%
Lvl. 3 Damage +5%
Lvl. 4 Damage +5%

skills.desc: Places a [Provoke] debuff on all enemies for 1 turn. Has a 50% chance of placing a [Provoke] debuff for 2 turns instead. Places a 30% [Reflect Damage] buff on this Champion for 2 turns.
skills.name: Bar Brawl

skills.desc: Revives an ally with 50% HP and fills their Turn Meter by 50%. Places a [Block Damage] buff on that ally for 1 turn.
skills.name: Cheers!

skills.desc: Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 15% when this Champion is hit. Fills the Turn Meters of all allies by 25% when this Champion is hit by a Boss.
skills.name: Rowdy Crowd [P]
